title: Discobolus (Harvard University)
text: A <a href="Bronze%20sculpture">bronze</a> replica of <a href="Myron">Myron</a>'s "<a href="Discobolus">Discobolus</a>" is installed on the <a href="Harvard%20University">Harvard University</a> campus in <a href="Cambridge%2C%20Massachusetts">Cambridge, Massachusetts</a>, United States.
